title: Porphyrin-based porous organic polymers synthesized using the Alder–Longo method: the most traditional synthetic strategy with exceptional capacity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20837-20855
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02277G, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Qian Liu, Wen Pan, Junshan Zhang, Mei Yang, Qin Chen, Feng Liu, Juan Li, Songrui Wei, Guoji Zhu
Porphyrin-based POPs obtained via the Alder–Longo method are reviewed in this work from the aspects of their design, preparation, and applications as well as the challenges and opportunities for their future development.
